Snecko:SneckoSoulRelic.NAME: Snecko Soul
DESCRIPTIONS: On pickup, add 6 random #yUnknown cards to your deck. NL At the start of combat, gain 1 Temporary HP for every 2 #yUnknown cards in your deck. NL Every 8 rooms, add a random #yUnknown card to your deck.

Snecko:SneckoSoulRelicUpgraded.NAME: Super Snecko Soul
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #gSnecko #gSoul.  NL At the start of combat, gain 1 Temporary HP for every 2 #yUnknown cards in your deck. Every 8 rooms, add a random #yUnknown #yRare card to your deck.

Snecko:ReduceCostRelic.NAME: Snecko Talon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of the most expensive card in your hand by 1.

Snecko:Free3CostRelic.NAME: Super Snecko Eye
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #gSnecko #gEye. At the start of your turn, draw #b2 additional cards. Start each combat #yConfused. NL Once per combat, when you draw a card that costs 3 or more, reduce its cost to 0.
